focus.sessionNote: CleanOS AI v0.1.0 build complete. Epic T001 done.

tasks.title: System Cleanup AI Desktop App
tasks.description: Complete Tauri + React desktop app for AI-powered system cleanup. Linux-only. Multi-AI provider support (OpenAI, Gemini, Claude, Kimi). File system analysis, Docker cleanup, package cache management.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:01:56Z] CleanOS AI v0.1.0 built successfully. Binary: 20MB, .deb: 7.1MB, .rpm: 7.1MB

tasks.description: Research phase for tech stack validation and architecture patterns

tasks.title: v2026.02 Bug Fixes, CalVer, Auto-Update & CI/CD
tasks.description: Fix launch bugs, implement CalVer versioning, GitHub Actions CI/CD, in-app auto-update from GitHub releases, and OpenRouter model discovery

tasks.title: BUG: Sidebar disk usage not calculating
tasks.description: Disk usage bar in sidebar shows empty. System info not being fetched or values not populating.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:26:03Z] Fixed: SystemInfo field names mismatched between Rust (disk_total) and TS (total_disk). Aligned all frontend components.

tasks.title: BUG: Dashboard total files and storage not calculating
tasks.description: Stat cards show 0 for total files and 0B for storage used. Scan not running on startup or values not connected.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:26:04Z] Fixed: Same field name mismatch causing null values. StorageBreakdown type also aligned.

tasks.title: BUG: Theme/dark mode colors broken - mixed colors
tasks.description: Dark mode changes but not all components use theme correctly. System theme detection doesnt work. Colors are mixed and inconsistent.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:26:05Z] Fixed: Added Tailwind v4 custom dark variant. Fixed CSS custom properties for dark mode.

tasks.title: BUG: AI Chat shows coming soon placeholder
tasks.description: AI Chat view is placeholder. Needs basic chat interface connected to configured AI provider.

tasks.title: BUG: Provider model versions are outdated/incorrect
tasks.description: Hardcoded model lists are wrong. Use OpenRouter API (GET https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/models) for live model discovery instead of static definitions.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:59:07Z] OpenRouter model discovery implemented. model-registry.ts with 1hr caching, providers.ts refactored with dynamic loading + static fallbacks, ProviderConfig.tsx has Refresh Models button. Backend proxy in models.rs + commands.rs.

tasks.title: Implement CalVer versioning (YYYY.MM.patch)
tasks.description: Switch from semver 0.1.0 to CalVer 2026.02.0. Update package.json, Cargo.toml, tauri.conf.json.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:26:06Z] CalVer 2026.02.0 applied to package.json, Cargo.toml, tauri.conf.json, Settings About page.

2026-02-14 08:59:24 UTC: Version format corrected from 2026.02.0 to 2026.2.0 (YYYY.MM.MICRO). Zero-padded months invalid in SemVer, stripped by NPM, rejected by PyPI. package.json was mismatched, now standardized across all 3 config files.

tasks.title: Initialize git repo and push to GitHub
tasks.description: Init git, create .gitignore, commit all code, create GitHub repo, push.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:59:40Z] Git repo initialized and pushed to GitHub at kryptobaseddev/cleanos-ai. Remote configured. Initial commit b22e915.

tasks.title: GitHub Actions CI/CD build pipeline
tasks.description: Create .github/workflows for building .deb, .rpm, AppImage on push/tag. Auto-create GitHub releases on version tags.

tasks.title: In-app auto-update from GitHub releases
tasks.description: Tauri updater plugin integration. Check GitHub releases for new versions. Show update notification in app. Download and install update. Version comparison using CalVer.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-14T08:59:18Z] Tauri updater plugin integrated. updater.rs with check_for_updates/install_update/get_current_version commands. UpdateChecker.tsx UI component with check/install/progress states. useUpdateChecker.ts hook. Sidebar shows Update badge. Version dynamically read from Cargo.toml via env!(CARGO_PKG_VERSION). BLOCKER: pubkey empty and no GitHub release endpoint exists yet.

tasks.title: BUG: Updater endpoint URL points to wrong GitHub user
notes: 2026-02-14 08:59:48 UTC: tauri.conf.json updater endpoint is https://github.com/keatonhoskins/cleanos-ai/... but actual remote is kryptobaseddev/cleanos-ai. Must fix to match actual GitHub repo.

tasks.title: Updater pubkey is empty - blocks production updates
notes: 2026-02-14 08:59:54 UTC: tauri.conf.json plugins.updater.pubkey is empty string. Tauri updater requires signing keypair for update verification. Must: 1) Generate key with pnpm tauri signer generate 2) Set pubkey in config 3) Set TAURI_SIGNING_PRIVATE_KEY in CI/CD

tasks.title: No GitHub release or latest.json exists for updater
notes: 2026-02-14 09:00:02 UTC: Updater configured to check GitHub releases endpoint but no release/latest.json exists. Update checks will fail until: 1) GitHub release created with built artifacts 2) latest.json generated per Tauri updater JSON format 3) Depends on T018 (CI/CD) and T021 (signing key)

tasks.title: AppImage bundler fails - linuxdeploy discovery issue
notes: 2026-02-14 09:00:08 UTC: Tauri AppImage bundler cannot find linuxdeploy despite it being installed at ~/.local/bin/linuxdeploy-x86_64.AppImage. Manual linuxdeploy execution succeeds. Workaround: symlink linuxdeploy -> linuxdeploy-x86_64.AppImage. .deb and .rpm build fine.

tasks.title: Duplicate dependencies in .deb package metadata
notes: 2026-02-14 09:00:16 UTC: deb control file shows: Depends: libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0, libgtk-3-0, libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0, libgtk-3-0. Each dependency listed twice. Tauri auto-detects deps AND reads from bundle.linux.deb.depends in tauri.conf.json, causing duplication. Fix: remove explicit depends from tauri.conf.json or deduplicate.

tasks.title: Default Tauri icons need custom branding verification
notes: 2026-02-14 09:00:24 UTC: Icons at src-tauri/icons/ have a custom teal/gold interlocking circles design. Need to verify: 1) Icon renders well at small sizes (16x16, 32x32) on desktop taskbar 2) .desktop file icon works in app launchers 3) Icon visible in both light and dark desktop themes 4) Consider creating SVG source for scalability

tasks.title: Rust code formatting issues reported by Ferrous Forge
notes: 2026-02-14 09:00:30 UTC: Build validation hook reports: Code formatting issues found in 1 files. Run cargo fmt in src-tauri/ to fix. Does not block build.

tasks.title: Zero Rust documentation coverage
notes: 2026-02-14 09:00:37 UTC: Ferrous Forge reports 0.0% rustdoc coverage. No doc comments on public Rust functions/structs. Not blocking but should be addressed for maintainability. Affects: commands.rs, updater.rs, models.rs, and all other public APIs.

tasks.title: Vite bundle exceeds 500KB warning threshold
notes: 2026-02-14 09:00:45 UTC: Production bundle index-5atmP7T9.js is 659.55KB (189KB gzipped). Exceeds Vite 500KB warning. Recharts library is the main contributor. Consider: 1) Code splitting with dynamic import() for charting page 2) manualChunks in rollupOptions 3) Or just increase chunkSizeWarningLimit if acceptable.

tasks.title: BUG: App crashes immediately on Wayland (WebKitGTK DMA-BUF)
notes: 2026-02-14 09:05:13 UTC: FIXED: App crashed on launch with 'Error 71 (Protocol error) dispatching to Wayland display'. Cause: WebKitGTK DMA-BUF renderer incompatibility on Fedora/Wayland/GNOME. Fix: Set WEBKIT_DISABLE_DMABUF_RENDERER=1 in lib.rs before Tauri init. Rebuilt and reinstalled RPM - app now launches correctly.
[COMPLETED 2026-02-14T09:05:18Z] Fixed in lib.rs. Set WEBKIT_DISABLE_DMABUF_RENDERER=1 env var before Tauri init. RPM rebuilt and reinstalled. App launches and stays open on Wayland.

tasks.title: Add persistent version + system info bar across all screens
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:21 UTC: No version number visible in sidebar or bottom bar. Need a persistent bottom appbar or sidebar footer showing: current version (from getCurrentVersion), system info (disk usage, OS), and any dynamic status. Should be visible across all screens.

tasks.title: BUG: Check for Updates throws error in Settings
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:23 UTC: Settings > Updates > Check for Updates button shows 'Failed to check for updates' error. Root cause: updater endpoint URL points to nonexistent GitHub release (T020 wrong URL, T022 no release exists). The updater pubkey is also empty (T021). This is expected to fail until T020/T021/T022 are resolved but the error message should be more user-friendly.

tasks.title: BUG: Dashboard Total Files and Storage shows 0, Scan Now non-functional
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:24 UTC: Dashboard shows Total Files: 0 and Storage Used: 0. Scan Now button does nothing when clicked. Need to: 1) Wire up Scan Now button to trigger scanDirectory command 2) Store scan results and update dashboard stats 3) Show meaningful defaults or prompt before first scan.

tasks.title: BUG: Files tab directory input not functional, Scan Directory broken
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:25 UTC: Files tab: 1) The ~ path input doesnt open a directory picker/browser - not intuitive for users 2) Scan Directory button does nothing when clicked 3) Need native directory picker dialog (Tauri dialog plugin) 4) Should show file browser after scan completes.

tasks.title: BUG: System Cleanup tab shows no data - depends on scan
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:27 UTC: System Cleanup tab appears empty/non-actionable. May be because no scan has been done. Need to: 1) Clarify dependency on scan vs independent system analysis 2) If independent, wire up system cleanup commands 3) Show helpful empty state explaining what to do.

tasks.title: BUG: System Cleanup Docker tab empty - not loading containers/images
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:28 UTC: System Cleanup > Docker tab shows nothing. The get_docker_info command exists in commands.rs but the frontend may not be calling it or handling the response. Need to: 1) Check if Docker is installed on system 2) Call getDockerInfo on tab mount 3) Display containers, images, volumes with cleanup actions.

tasks.title: BUG: System Cleanup Package Caches tab empty
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:46 UTC: System Cleanup > Package Caches tab shows nothing. Backend has get_package_caches and clean_package_cache commands in commands.rs. Frontend needs to call getPackageCaches on tab mount and display cache sizes with cleanup actions.

tasks.title: BUG: System Cleanup Logs tab empty
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:47 UTC: System Cleanup > Logs tab shows nothing. May need backend command to scan system logs (/var/log, journald) and frontend to display with cleanup options.

tasks.title: BUG: System Cleanup Browser Caches tab empty
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:49 UTC: System Cleanup > Browser Caches tab shows nothing. Need to implement browser cache detection for common browsers (Chrome, Firefox, etc) and display sizes with cleanup actions.

tasks.title: BUG: API key not saving/persisting in Settings
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:50 UTC: Settings > AI Providers: entering an API key and saving does not persist. Key disappears on revisit. Backend uses keyring crate for credential storage (credentials.rs). Need to verify: 1) storeApiKey command is being called on save 2) keyring service is accessible 3) getApiKey/hasApiKey work on reload.

tasks.title: BUG: Settings Add/Remove directory buttons non-functional
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:51 UTC: Settings > General > Scan Directories: 1) Add directory button does nothing 2) Remove button on existing directories does nothing 3) Directories are hardcoded as ~/Documents, ~/Downloads, ~/Desktop 4) Need to wire up to settings storage (get_setting/set_setting) and add native directory picker.

tasks.title: BUG: Theme detection broken - Light mode despite system dark mode, title bar doesn't follow theme
notes: 2026-02-14 09:18:53 UTC: System theme detection not working: 1) App defaults to light mode even when system is in dark mode 2) Title bar/window decorations do not follow the app theme toggle 3) Need to detect system preference via prefers-color-scheme media query or Tauri theme API 4) Title bar theme requires Tauri window theme configuration.
